Package net.hudup.core.alg

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Alg
    Alg is the most abstract interface for all algorithms.
    CompositeAlg
    This interface indicates a composite algorithm that uses one or more other algorithms to run.
    DuplicatableAlg
    This interface represents the algorithm that are able to be duplicated.
    KBase
    Data in Hudup framework is organized into two following formats:
    Low-level format is structured as rating matrix whose each row consists of user ratings on items, often called raw data.
    ModelBasedAlg
    This interface indicates an algorithm that learns and uses knowledge base to execute.
    RecommendFilter
    This interface represents a filter which is performed before any recommendation tasks.
    RmiAlg
    This interface indicates an RMI service considered as an algorithm.
    ServiceAlg
    This interface indicates an service considered as an algorithm.
    SetupAlgListener
    This interface represents a listener for successful setting up process.
    SocketAlg
    This interface indicates an socket service considered as an algorithm.
    TestingAlg
    This interface represents any executable algorithm.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAlg
    This is abstract class of Alg interface.
    AlgDesc
    This class represents description of an algorithm.
    AlgDescList
    This class represents a list of algorithm descriptions.
    AlgList
    This class is used to store many algorithms.
    CompositeRecommender
    Recommendation strategy is defined as the co-ordination of recommendation algorithms such as collaborative filtering and content-based filtering in accordance with coherent process so as to achieve the best result of recommendation.
    KBaseAbstract
    This abstract implements partially KBase interface by adding a configuration KBaseAbstract.config to configure it and a data source KBaseAbstract.datasource to point to where to locate the dataset from which this knowledge base is learned (trained).
    KBaseRecommendIntegrated
    This abstract class models a so-called integrated KBase, which provides advances methods on knowledge base.
    MemoryBasedRecommender
    Two typical inherited classes of Recommender are MemoryBasedRecomender and ModelBasedRecommender which in turn are abstract classes for memory-based recommendation algorithm and model-based recommendation algorithm.
    ModelBasedRecommender
    Two typical inherited classes of Recommender are MemoryBasedRecomender and ModelBasedRecommender which in turn are abstract classes for memory-based recommendation algorithm and model-based recommendation algorithm.
    RecommendContextPrefilter
    Traditional recommendation study focuses on inherent information about users and items and how to recommend such relevant items to such users.
    Recommender
    This abstract class represents all recommendation algorithms.
    RecommendFilterList
    This class contains a list of filters, called filter list as a convention.
    RecommendFilterParam
    Before recommendation task is performed (for example, producing a list of recommended items), the filtering tasks are performed.
    RecommendParam
    When a recommendation task is performed, a parameter of recommendation needs to be provided as an indicator.
    RmiRecommender
    This interface indicates an RMI service considered as an recommendation algorithm.
    ServiceRecommender
    This is not real recommender (recommendation algorithm).
    SetupAlgEvent
    This class represents an event fired by a source (often evaluator) for successful setting up an algorithm.
    SocketRecommender
    This interface indicates an socket service considered as a recommendation algorithm.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SetupAlgEvent.Type
    Type of setting up event.
